p: TFV disoproxil fumarate encapsulated in multifunctional magneto-plasmonic liposomes, a hybrid system combining liposomes and magneto-plasmonic NPs, enabled the treatment in the brain microenvironment that is inaccessible to most of the drugs, showed enhanced transmigration across an in vitro BBB model by magnetic targeting, and exhibited desired therapeutic effects against HIV-infected microglia cells, while the gold shell of liposomes showed bright positive contrast in X-ray computed tomography (Tomitaka et al. 2018).
